titles.title: A resolution concerning the recent forest fires in Greece.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 10/2/2007--Introduced. Extends the condolences and sympathy of the Senate to the government and the people of Greece for the grave loss of life and vast destruction caused by the devastating fires raging through Greece. Supports the Administration's initiatives to provide assistance and relief to the people of Greece, including its pledge of $1.5 million in aid as well as expert and technical assistance. Encourages public institutions, specialized agencies, as well as private citizens, to offer their resources.
